definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

pinyin: tu2 xing2 yong4 hu4 jie4 mian4

sentences.english: The Research and Application of User Interface in CAID System;
sentences.chinese: 用户界面旋钮型的直观且易于使用。

sentences.english: One major concern for a rich user interface is layout management.
sentences.chinese: 对于富用户界面，一个重要的方面就是布局管理。

sentences.english: New features include equalisation technology and a user-friendly interface.
sentences.chinese: 新功能包括均衡技术，以及友好的用户界面。

sentences.english: We accomplished this by completely separating the data from the user interface.
sentences.chinese: 我们通过将数据与用户界面分离来实现该目的。

sentences.english: You can follow one of any number of processes in designing the user interface.
sentences.chinese: 在大量用户界面设计流程中可以任意挑选一个来遵循。

sentences.english: I do not merely mean a nice user interface with friendly buttons.
sentences.chinese: 我不仅仅指带有友好按钮的漂亮用户界面。

sentences.english: You will be impressed by the easiness and simplicity of user's interface.
sentences.chinese: 你会对该软件舒适且简单的用户界面留下深刻的印象。

sentences.english: Which user interface environment do they use?
sentences.chinese: 它们使用哪个用户界面环境？

sentences.english: Also, links that appear in the user interface are italicized .
sentences.chinese: 同时，在用户界面中的链接也使用了斜体字。

sentences.english: The setup is basically the same, but the user interface has been tailored to fit better into the mobile user experience.
sentences.chinese: 但用户界面经过调整以更好的适应移动用户体验。

sentences.english: User interface elements are normally hierarchic.
sentences.chinese: 用户界面元素通常是分级的。

sentences.english: Start the debugger user interface on the client machine.
sentences.chinese: 启动客户端机器上的调试器用户界面。

sentences.english: Specifically, the design of user interfaces in software.
sentences.chinese: 特别是软件中的用户界面设计。

sentences.english: One of the Powerset innovations is surfacing of semantics to the user interface.
sentences.chinese: powerset创新之一是语义表面化于用户界面。

sentences.english: In the instantaneous profile gauge system, user interface is an important part.
sentences.chinese: 凸度仪系统中，用户界面是一重要组成部分。

pinyin: tu2 xing2 yong4 hu4 jie4 mian4

definition: see 開放源碼|开放源码[kai1 fang4 yuan2 ma3]
